text: Ni we wabaremye abakomoye ku muntu umwe (Adamu), nuko amuremera umugore we [Hawa (Eva)] amumukomoyemo kugira amuboneho ituze. Iyo umwe (mu ngo rubyaro rwa Adamu) abonanye nâ€™umugore we, asama inda abasha kugendana bimworoheye. Iyo amaze gukurirwa, basaba Allah Nyagasani wabo bagira bati "Nuramuka uduhaye umwana utunganye, rwose tuzaba mu bashimira
